Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate was questioned by a senior player after deciding to omit Jack Grealish from his Euro 2024 squad
Post-Match Reflections: Grealish struggled for form at Manchester City last season and Southgate revealed that the performances of other players in the squad played a major part in his decision to leave the winger behind
Miscellaneous Highlights: England start their Euro 2024 campaign with a fixture against Serbia on June 16
Others: Grealish was'stunned and upset' upon learning that he would not be a part of England's squad for the Euros
